boardgame.name: Warhammer: Diskwars
boardgame.description: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;The cost of victory is blood, the cost of defeat is everything._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash;The Empire at War_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Set amid the constant warfare of the Old World, Warhammer: Diskwars is a game of ferocious, fast-paced tabletop battles for two to four players. At the heart of the game's conflicts are its disks, which represent heroes and units from across the Old World. During the game, you activate these disks, flipping them end over end to move them across the battlefield, position them to attack, and interact with terrain and other disks it overlaps. When one disk covers another disk, the disk on top is considered to be _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;pinning_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; the disk below it; this prevents the pinned disk from activating, and at the end of the round, overlapping disks must fight one another. By maneuvering carefully to pin your opponent's units, you can strike them down, seize control of the battlefield, and win the day!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Warhammer: Diskwars has been updated to its new setting within the Warhammer world and features flexible rules for hero-centric army-building. Additionally, whereas the original Diskwars was a collectible game, Warhammer: Diskwars has moved away from the blind buy model, and the Core Set includes everything you need to play the game: a host of terrain cards, objectives, command cards, and more than sixty disks for the game's four races._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: AP Podcast – Episodio 12: Ascension Rise of Vigil
Episode 35 - Two out of Three Ain_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t Bad
Episode 44 Let Loose the Pogs of War

Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: 2-4 players (Fantasy flight) Languages: Enlgish

Fantasy Flight Games (FFGWHD01) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;The cost of victory is blood, the cost of defeat is everything._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; - The Empire at War. Set amid the constant warfare of the Old World, Warhammer: Diskwars is a game of ferocious, fast-paced tabletop battles for two to four players. At the heart of the game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s conflicts are its disks, which represent heroes and units from across the Old World. During the game, you activate these disks, flipping them end over end to move them across the battlefield and position them to attack. With a host of terrain cards, objectives, command cards, and more than sixty disks for the game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s four races, the Core Set includes everything you need to build your first armies and dive into the fray!

CLS Games - Atlanta_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Board Game Warehouse - is the largest retailer of board games in metro Atlanta! All games are new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; still in factory shrink-wrap. WARHAMMER DISKWARS: $25.95 Fantasy Flight Games [FFG WHD01] SHIPPING Continental U.S. - $14.95 International (Including AK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; HI) - TBD

Versand erfolgt versichert mit DHL und Versandkosten fallen dementsprechend nach Gewicht und Größe an. Falls Du weitere Informationen oder Bilder benötigst schreibe mir bitte eine Nachricht. If you need more information or pictures please send me a message.
